CirnoMod.Power.Flying.NAME: Flight
DESCRIPTIONS: Receives #b{1}% less attack damage. NL Receiving attack damage reduces #y{0} by #b{2}. NL Becomes #yStunned if cancelled.

CirnoMod.Power.Frozen.NAME: Frozen
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduces #b{1} #yStrength. NL At the end of turn, gains #b{1} #yBlock and reduces #y{0} by #b{2}.
